short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Format text input as markdown using Prettier when cmd+opt+Semicolon is pressed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Markdown Formatter â€“ Prettier Integration for Input Fields

This Chrome extension allows you to quickly format the text inside any text input field or textarea as Markdown using Prettier, a powerful code formatter. Simply press the keyboard shortcut, and your text will be instantly formatted.

Features:
Markdown Formatting: Formats text inside input fields and text areas as Markdown.
Keyboard Shortcuts:
* macOS: Cmd + Option + Semi-colon
* Windows/Linux: Ctrl + Alt +  + Semi-colon

Prettier Integration: Uses the popular Prettier library to ensure beautifully formatted Markdown every time.
Works Across All Websites: Seamlessly format text on any webpage where input fields or textareas are present.

How to Use:
Focus on any text input field or textarea.
Press the key combination (Cmd+Opt+Semi-colon on macOS or Ctrl+Alt+Semi-colon on Windows/Linux).
Watch your text transform into properly formatted Markdown!
This extension is perfect for developers, writers, or anyone who frequently works with Markdown in web-based editors.
